name: Rock'EmSock'EmRobots
0: ”Alexa, open Rock em Sock em Robots”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rock em sock em robots
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to the World of Robot Boxing! Play each day to train, upgrade, and personalize your Robot to create your perfect Battling-Bot. Fight your way up the ranks to claim the ultimate title of the Mega Weight Champion.

Based on the classic Mattel Toy, Rock ‘Em Sock ‘Em Robots offers a new voice game made for screen-based devices. Give your Robot Boxer commands and watch your champion throw Quick Jabs, Mega Punches, and Block-Knockin’ Super Moves!

Join the Robot Boxing League today! To start training your own Robot Boxer, just say, “Alexa open Rock ‘Em Sock ‘Em Robots”.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This skill requires Alexa’s parental consent by an adult in the household (if not already granted). Visit https://www.amazon.com/myh/vpc/intro?clientId=Alexa_rw_vpc to give consent through your Amazon account.

Voice purchase settings are available in your Alexa App.

NOTE: Disabling the skill will cause you to lose your game progress.

© 2020 MATTEL. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
